attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ban the smoking licence's, its not right that smokers have to pay for what they want to do with there lives.

If we had to pay for drinking,talking and walking aswell britain would be broke.

If the government spent money more wisely they would'nt cook up stupid schemes to get money out of us.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at : http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/smokingpermit/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
